name: textView(_:didCheckTextIn:types:options:results:orthography:wordCount:)
desc: Invoked to allow the delegate to modify the text checking results after checking has occurred.
declaration:
optional func textView(_ view: NSTextView, 
        didCheckTextIn range: NSRange, 
                 types checkingTypes: NSTextCheckingTypes, 
               options: [NSSpellChecker.OptionKey : Any] = [:], 
               results: [NSTextCheckingResult], 
           orthography: NSOrthography, 
             wordCount: Int) -> [NSTextCheckingResult]
